[page 332/642]
     These  are  basically  the  top  single  models  for  now   (conventionally  after  these,  additional  vocal  residues  kick  in,  especially  if  not  a  vocal  model)  Based  on  Multisong  dataset  evaluation  on  MVSEP  chart  with  similar  or  the  same  parameters  
and
 
inference
 
if
 
applicable.

Mel
